channel.title: Proxy Advisory on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Proxy Advisory on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:115 Chances: Disney is a well-established international family entertainment and media enterprise with a strong presence in television, radio, direct-to-consumer services, amusement parks, and hotels. The company has a credible plan in place and is making progress based on recent earnings reports. Glass Lewis, a proxy advisory firm, has recommended shareholders to re-elect all of the company’s directors, indicating a vote of confidence in Disney’s current board and management.
